bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Statement fragment regarding Walter Reed, by Jefferson Randolph Kean, [1904]

div1.p: Kean states that Reed did not give up his life demonstrating the mosquito theory. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Statement fragment regarding Walter Reed, by Jefferson Randolph Kean, [1904]
div1.p:
the mosquito theory of the conveyance
of yellow fever. The publication of
this committee and a biographical
sketch of Dr. Reed is sent you under
separate enclosure, from which it will
be seen that Dr. Reed, although a great
public benefactor, did not give up his
life demonstrating the mosquito theo-
ry of yellow fever.

By order of the Surgeon General:
J.R.K., Major, Surgeon, U.S. Army.
A.
